description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
22 Ripplevale Grove, Islington, London, N1 1HU

TPO Reference
T19 - Oak of Barnsbury (No.4) TPO 1976

PO Number
T080462

Work specifications
1 x Oak (T19) as detailed in Barnsbury (No.4) TPO 1976
Fell to ground level and remove stump

Decision:
Approve Subject to conditions
decision_conditions: Within one planting season of the removal of the Oak tree a replacement heavy standard Field Maple shall be planted in a similar location within the rear garden of 22 Ripplevale Grove.  It is advised that given the size of the garden that it would be more suitable to locate the replacement tree further from the rear boundary with Brayfield Terrace.  The treeâ€™s location, confirmation of the species, supplier and size shall confirm to the Principal Tree Preservation Officer within 30days of the replacement tree having been planted.
